column5: It’s Christmas and Ribín & Glibín want to give each other a present.   Things work out for them in the end with Cicí’s help and Cicí learns that love is the best present of all.

column2: Sraith puipéadóireachta do ghasúir réamhscoile. Bí i dteannta Ghlibín agus Ribín, carachtair ó dhomhan eile a thuairteann ar an domhan seo ina spáslong. Tá cónaí anois orthu faoin tsráid agus tá cairde nua acu; Cicí, Rocco & Dris a bhfuil banna rac ceoil acu; “Na feithidí “. Bíonn fadhb le réiteach ag Ribín & ag Glibín i ngach clár agus éiríonn leo le cabhair ó dhaoine óga a bhfuil cónaí orthu os cionn na sráide. Beidh neart amhrán nua-chumtha, scéalta idir nua agus aitheanta ó litríocht na Gaeilge agus spraoi.

column5: Har! Har! Ribín and Glibín have been captured by the Pirates.  Will they manage to escape? Ribín isn’t very hopeful but then Glibín thinks of a great plan……

column2: Har! Har! Tá Ribín agus Glibín fuadaithe ag foghlaithe mara. An féidir leo éalú? Ní bhíonn mórán dóchais ag Ribín go dtí go smaoiníonn Glibín ar phlean.

column5: Ribín is delighted when she is given a magic ring. This ring has amazing powers and can make your dreams come true.  Not everything works out the way you might hope however, as poor Ribín finds out.

column2: Bíonn ríméad ar Ribín nuair a fhaigheann sí fáinne draíochta. Is fáinne draíochta é a thugann mian do chroí duit ach ní mar a shíltear a bhítear i gcónaí, ceacht a fhoghlaimíonn Ribín bhocht.

column5: There’s a thief in the underground world. Rocco’s Balloon has disappeared. Who took it? Dris is on the scene to investigate. Above ground, Ribín's young friends are busy spying.

column2: Tá gadaí thíos faoin tsráid! Ghoid sé balún Rocco. Ach cé hé féin?  Tá an bleachtaire Dris in aice láimhe agus bí cinnte go mbeidh freagra na ceiste aigesean! Os cionn sráide, tá cairde Ribín & Glibín ag spiaireacht.

column5: It’s April Fool’s Day and Ribín and Glibín want to play a trick on her friends. But perhaps she plays the trick once too often. Poor Ribín

column2: Lá na nAmadán atá ann agus tá Ribín ag iarraidh cleas a imirt ar a cuid cairde. Ach filleann an feall ar an bhfeallaire. Ribín bhocht! Tá cairde Ribín & Ghlibín ag imirt cleas os cionn sráide chomh maith.

column5: It’s Cicí’s Birthday. Rocco makes a beautiful birthday cake for her. Ribín and Glibín drop the cake by accident. Will they manage to replace the cake before the party?

column2: Breithlá Chicí atá ann agus déanann Rocco cáca álainn di. Ach milleann Ribín agus Glibín é trí thimpiste. An féidir leo cáca eile a dhéanamh in am don chóisir?

column5: Ribín breaks Dris’ drum by accident. Will they be able to replace it? And will they be able to replace it before the big concert?

column2: Briseann Ribín druma Dhris trí thimpiste. An féidir leo an ceol céanna a bhaint as rud éigin eile?  Agus an féidir é a dhéanamh in am don cheolchoirm mhór?

column5: Stone Soup? Is it even possible? Cicí, Ribín & co. discover that maybe it is possible to make soup from a stone with a little bit of co-operation and kindness.

column2: An féidir anraith a dhéanamh as clocha? Is féidir, is cosúil, má bhíonn gach duine go deas lena chéile agus má bhíonn gach duine sásta cúnamh a thabhairt. Os cionn sráide, bíonn neart le foghlaim ag Ribín & Glibín faoi bheith ag obair as lámh a chéile.

column5: Ribín & Glibín hear the story of the Salmon of Knowledge for the first time.  We see the story re-enacted with the cast below ground.  Ribín wonders what it would be like to be as smart as Fionn Mac C
column6: Cloiseann Ribín & Glibín an scéal faoin mBradán Feasa den chéad uair. Bíonn siad an-tógtha leis an scéal. Ba mhaith le Ribín a bheith chomh cliste le Fionn Mac Cumhaill.

column5: Ribín’s imagination runs away with her. She imagines a sequence of events that lead to a fairytale ending, that is until the others bring her back to reality.  Meanwhile, above ground, there’s the mat
column6: Tá an tsamhlaíocht ag fáil an cheann is fearr ar Ribín! Os cionn sráide, tá uibheacha ar iarraidh. Meas tú cé a ghoid iad?

column5: Ribín is making a present for Glibín as a surprise. Glibín can’t figure out why Ribín is avoiding him and his feelings are hurt. He is very lonely without her..
column6: Tá Ribín ag déanamh bronntanais do Ghlibín i ngan fhios dó. Ceapann Glibín gurb é nach bhfuil sí mór leis níos mó agus bíonn sé an-uaigneach dá huireasa.

column5: Each of the friends below ground need something but they don’t have any money. The funny thing is that each of them have got items that they want to throw away as well. Perhaps a bit of swapping and c
column6: Tá rudaí nua de dhíth ar gach duine dár gcairde thíos faoin tsráid ach níl aon phingin acu. Tá daoine eile ag caitheamh rudaí amach.  An bhfuil réiteach na faidhbe os a gcomhair amach?

column5: Glibín would like to be a Superhero but he doesn’t think he has  any super powers. His friends show him that maybe he does have a special power after all and that he is better than any superhero!

column2: Ba mhaith le Glibín a bheith ina shárlaoch ach níl aon chumhacht speisialta aige! Taispeánann a chairde dó go bhfuil cumhacht iontach aige agus go bhfuil sé níos fearr ná sárlaoch ar bith.

column5: A Phone falls down the drain from the street above. It’s little Red Riding Hood’s phone. Will Ribín & Glibín be able to prevent the Wolf from meeting up with Little Red Riding Hood and change the endi
column6: Titeann fón anuas den tsráid. Fón Chochaillín Dearg atá ann. An féidir le Ribín agus Glibín í a thabhairt slán ón mac tíre?

column5: Cící participates in a big singing competition. On her return, she hurts Ribín’s feelings. She is a big star now. She doesn’t have any time for her friend. But then, she loses her voice after too much
column6: Nuair a thagann Cící abhaile ó chomórtas amhránaíochta ní bhíonn sí róchairdiúil le Ribín.  Is réalta mhór anois í.  Níl am aici le bheith ag caint lena cara. Ach ansin cailleann sí a guth. An mbeidh Ribín sásta cabhrú léi?  Beidh cairde le Ribín & Glibín os cionn sráide ag canadh sa seomra ranga freisin.

column5: Cící writes a play with Glibín in the main part! The story of Oisín & Niamh as we have never heard it before.  Cicí is quite the bossy director!

column2: Scríobhann Cící dráma agus is ag Glibín a bhíonn an phríomhpháirt! Scéal Oisín agus Niamh atá ann ach ní mar a chuala muid cheana é! Baineann Cící an-taitneamh as a ról mar stiúrthóir. Tá na daoine óga os cionn na sráide ag cleachtadh do dhráma freisin!

column5: Ribin & Glibín have never seen snow before. They are amazed. Ribín discovers a snowman in the garden and takes him inside so that he won't be cold. It's a good job that her brother Glibín is around to
column6: Ní fhaca Ribín ná Glibín sneachta riamh. Tagann Ribín ar fhear sneachta sa ghairdín agus tugann sí isteach taobh istigh é. Is maith an rud é go bhfuil deartháir aici le gach rud a chur ina cheart arís.  Tá go leor le foghlaim ag Glibín faoi shneachta óna chairde os cionn sráide.

column5: Who is throwing rubbish everywhere? Glibín is not one bit happy. It’s a good job that the Superhero ‘Croí Mór’ comes for a visit and figures out who the culprits are.

column2: Cé atá ag caitheamh bruscair ar fud na háite? Níl Glibín sásta faoi seo ar chor ar bith. Is maith an rud é go bhfuil an sárlaoch ‘Croí Mór’ ann chun gach rud a chur ina cheart.  Idir an dá linn, casann Ribín le cairde os cionn sráide atá ag déanamh róbait as bruscar.

column5: The re-telling of the story of Labhraidh Loinseach. The King has a secret. His ears are like those of a horse and that’s why he always has to chase away his barbers.
column6: Athinsint ar scéal Labhraidh Loinseach. Tá rún ag an rí. Tá cluasa capaill air agus sin é an fáth nach ligfidh sé cead d’aon duine a ghruaig a bhearradh. Nuair a fhaigheann Eoin post mar ghruagaire ní bhíonn a mháthair ró-shásta. Insíonn Ribín & Glibín an scéal dá gcairde os cionn sráide.

column5: Ribín and Glibín go on a picnic together. Ribín had an amazing day but poor Glibín had a terrible day. How could this be? Cící gets to the bottom of things!

column2: Téann Ribín agus Glibín ar phicnic. Bíonn an-lá ag Ribín ach bíonn fíor-dhrochlá ag Glibín. Cén chaoi ar tharla sé sin? Faigheann Cící amach faoi gach rud a tharla!

column5: The story of The Three Little Pigs as you have never heard it before.   In this story the Big Bad Wolf tells his side of the story and it seems that none of it was his fault at all.. Poor wolf.

column2: Sraith puipéadóireachta do ghasúir réamhscoile. Scéal na Trí Mhuc á insint ag an mac tíre dána.

column5: It’s Halloween and what a night! Poor Ribín can not sleep. Strange noises can be heard from all over the house.
column6: Oíche Shamhna atá ann agus níl Ribín bhocht in ann codladh ag torann aisteach atá ar fud an tí.

column5: Ribín wants to play music with Rocco but there is a major problem. Ribín’s music is awful.
column6: Ba mhaith le Ribín dul ag ceol in éineacht le Rocco ach níl aon cheol aici.

column5: Ribín & Glibín discover a beanstalk. Their curiosity gets the better of them and they climb to the top. They get their heart’s desire but not in the way they had imagined.

column2: Tagann Ribín agus Glibín ar ghas pónaire. Ar ndóigh caithfidh siad é a dhreapadh go bhfeicfidh siad céard atá ag a bharr. Faigheann siad mian a gcroíthe ach ní mar a shíltear a bítear.

column5: This is Officially Amazing! Today we will see some extraordinary official world record attempts from around the world including real life cowboy Will Roberts. Will is attempting records involving guns
column6: Seo é Dochreidte Gan Dabht, an clár ar a mbeidh na curiarrachtaí is aistí, is iontaí agus is dochreidte dá bhfaca tú riamh - an buachaill bó, Will Roberts ina measc a bheidh ag tabhairt faoi churiarrachtaí le gunnaí agus rópaí. Á chur i láthair ag Eoghan Ó Loideáin.

column5: Talon plants a freezing device on the Gadget-bus.
column6: Cuireann Dealg gaireas reoite i mbus Gaisce.

column5: The gang time travels to turn Dr. Claw before evil can take hold.
column6: Téann an gheaing siar san am ag féachaint le duine deas a dhéanamh den Dochtúir Damanta.

column5: Gadget's team competes on a Japanese game show hosted by MADcat.
column6: Glacann Gaisce páirt i dtráth na gceist Seapánach á chur i láthair ag an gcat damanta.

column5: MAD uses a device to switch Brain and MADcat's bodies.
column6: Úsáideann Dealg uirlis thástála le colainn Ghlic agus an cat damanta a bhabhtáil.

column5: Dr. Claw sends MADtana Dan to trigger a volcanic eruption in Hawaii.
column6: Féachann an Dochtúir Damanta le bolcán a phléascadh i Haváí.

column5: Dr. Claw creates a device to turn off all the world's electronic gadgets.
column6: Cruthaíonn an Dochtúir Damanta gaireas a chasann as gach gléas leictreonach ar domhan.

column5: In order to break into HQ, MAD creates an evil clone of Penny.
column6: Déanann Dealg clón d'Aisling le briseadh isteach sa gCeanncheathrú.

column5: Dr. Claw steals the largest penny in the world.
column6: Goideann Dealg an bonn is mó ar domhan.

column5: Brain gets a dose of MAD's new serum and turns into a werewolf.
column6: Iompaíonn Glic isteach ina mhac tíre.

column5: Inspector Gadget is invited to deliver a speech at Villain University.
column6: Tá lá oscailte sheanollscoil an Dochtúra Damanta ar siúl agus iarrtar ar Ghaisce óráid a thabhairt.

column5: The Pteranodon family join Gilbert on the Dinosaur Train Submarine and they pay Shoshana Shonisaurus a visit.
column6: Rachaidh muintir Pteranodon ar cuairt chuig Shoshana Shonisaurus in éineacht le Gilbert ar fhomhuireán Thraein na nDineasár.

column5: The Dinosaur Train Submarine go on a special trip to the bottom of the sea to visit Otto Opthalmosaurus.
column6: Téann Fomhuireán Thraein na nDineasár ar thuras speisialta go bun na farraige chun cuairt a thabhairt ar Otto Opthalmosaurus.

column5: The Dinosaur Train has all 26 dinosaurs mentioned in the `Dinosaurs A to Z' song on board.
column6: Tá Traein na nDineasár plódaithe ag 26 dineasár éagsúla a bheidh san amhrán "Aibítir na nDineasár”.  Tosaíonn Tiny ar an amhrán i mBaile Troodon agus glacann na dineasáir eile ar fad páirt ann.

column5: The Pteranodon kids learn about classification, and Don leads the way organizing the dinosaurs on the train by their species, features, and size.
column6: Foghlaimíonn na páistí faoi rangú agus tosaíonn Don ag eagrú na nDineasár ar an traein de réir a gcineál, a dtréithe agus a méide.

column5: The Dinosaur Train continues travelling around the Mesozoic picking up more and more dinosaurs that are in the `Dinosaurs A to Z' song, on the way to a picnic at Troodon Town.
column6: An t-amhrán "Aibítir na nDineasár" a bheidh againn inniu.

column5: Tiny gets the idea to gather all the dinosaurs in the 'Dinosaurs A to Z' song for a picnic at Troodon Town.  The Conductor agrees, and the Train starts picking up dinosaurs.
column6: Tá Tiny ag iarraidh na dineasáir ar fad atá in 'Aibítir na nDineasár' a bhailiú le chéile do phicnic i mbaile Troodon.

column5: Buddy expresses his feelings about being adopted to Tiny and Mrs. Pteranodon.
column6: Insíonn Buddy do Tiny agus do Bhean Pteranodon faoin gcaoi a n-airíonn sé faoi gur uchtaithe atá sé.

column5: The Pteranodon family join the Lambeosaurus family at the big pond where they celebrate the Autumn moon celebration by decorating pumpkins.
column6: Téann Muintir Pteranodon in éineacht le Muintir Lambeosaurus chuig an Linn Mhór chun Gealach an Fhómhair a cheiliúradh.

column5: The kids take the Dinosaur Train all the way to the roundhouse which the troodons have decorated into a haunted house.
column6: Tugann Traein na nDineasár na páistí chuig an teach cruinn a bhfuil teach taibhsí déanta de.

column5: Two tourists named Tommy and Adam come from across the sea arriving at the Big Pond on a raft.
column6: Rachaidh Tommy agus Adam ar thuras trasna na farraige chuig an Linn Mhór ar rafta.

column5: Sally and Nick are going on an adventure but how are they going to get there?
column6: Tá Sailí agus Nic ag dul ar eachtra, ach cén chaoi a rachaidh siad ann?

column5: Nick has spotted a tiny ladybug but Sally has found an even smaller ant!
